name: Spacewar [Valve test game]
description:
This is most likely a Valve test game for the fist version of Steam, It is nothing more then a prototype. Not much information is found on this game so I cant directly say what is was for, It was probably to test Multiplayer/Local  games. In no way do I own this game or asset's. Their is also no publisher / logo connected to it so it was probably only meant to be a test game.

 DON'T UPLOAD IT TO STEAM, as that will get you in legal trouble.

Linux download will not be included sorry.

(The game has multiplayer but It doesn't work, as it isn't connected to any servers)
